skills.name: unified-agent-framework
skills.definition: Single AgentExecutor handles all parallel agent work across environments (local, sandbox). Synthesis is pluggable (Chairman, Voting, Summary). Compute backends are swappable via ComputeGateway.
skills.key_insight: Execution environment is configuration, not a separate system

skills.name: compute-gateway-pattern
skills.definition: Abstract compute backends like LLMGateway abstracts LLM providers. create_environment, execute, execute_agent, terminate methods. Currently E2B, future Docker/Modal.

skills.name: synthesis-strategies
skills.definition: Pluggable strategies for combining multi-agent results: VotingSynthesis (fast, no LLM), SummarySynthesis (LLM-based summary), ChairmanSynthesis (authoritative judgment).

strategies.voting: Count-based consensus, no additional LLM calls
strategies.chairman: Chairman agent reviews all responses, produces authoritative verdict with key_insights, dissenting_views, recommendation

skills.name: document-intelligence-pipeline
skills.definition: Five-agent pipeline for document analysis: Concept Extractor → Requirement Miner → Relationship Mapper → Staleness Detector → Classifier. Results stored in Graph-Service and KnowledgeBeast.
agents: doc-concept-extractor: Extract named concepts (products, features, technologies)
doc-relationship-mapper: Map entity relationships (integrates_with, depends_on, contains)
doc-classifier: Determine doc type/status/action (plan, concept, guide, report, session)

skills.name: concept-extraction-schema
skills.definition: Standard schema for extracted concepts: name, type (product/feature/module/process/technology/framework/methodology), definition, status, domain, related_entities, source_quote, confidence.

skills.name: requirement-mining-schema
skills.definition: Standard schema for mined requirements: id (REQ-XXX), text (normalized), type (functional/non-functional/constraint/dependency/outcome), priority, source_concept, source_quote, verification, status.

skills.name: document-classification-taxonomy
skills.definition: Taxonomy for document classification: types (plan, concept, guide, reference, report, session, archive), statuses (active, completed, superseded, abandoned, stale), actions (keep, update, archive, merge, extract_and_archive, delete).

concepts.name: AgentExecutor
concepts.definition: Unified entry point for running agents. Handles parallel execution, environment selection (local/sandbox), and synthesis strategy selection.

concepts.name: ComputeGateway
concepts.definition: Unified interface for compute backends. Like LLMGateway abstracts LLM providers, ComputeGateway abstracts execution environments (E2B, Docker, Modal).

concepts.name: UnifiedAgent
concepts.definition: Base agent abstraction that works in any execution environment. Provides get_system_prompt(), get_task_prompt(), execute_local(), get_sandbox_prompt() methods.

concepts.name: SynthesisResult
concepts.definition: Result of synthesizing multiple agent outputs: final_answer, confidence, consensus_level, summary, key_insights, dissenting_views, total_cost_usd, agent_results.

concepts.name: Document Intelligence
concepts.definition: CommandCenter's ability to analyze any document corpus and extract structured knowledge (concepts, requirements, relationships, classifications) using specialized agent personas.

relationships.description: AgentExecutor uses ComputeGateway for sandbox execution
AgentExecutor uses LLMGateway for local execution
Content indexed in KnowledgeBeast for search
